items.title: Rising Health Premiums Push More Small Businesses to Drop Coverage
items.description: More people are eligible for healthcare insurance through work, but a new study shows many companies say costs are too high to offer it.

items.title: Elon Musk’s AI Chatbot Grok Faces Investigation Over Sexual Deepfakes
items.description: The EU opened an investigation after Grok spewed nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images on the platform.
